status.command_line: mkdir ./index && mkdir ./output && salmon index -i ./index --kmerLen '31' --gencode --transcripts '/galaxy/server/database/objects/8/8/1/dataset_88144e85-af9e-406f-b036-3484a75c8290.dat' && ln -s '/galaxy/server/database/objects/d/0/c/dataset_d0cdd4b3-228f-49c9-a529-ca91306f78c0.dat' ./mate1.fastq && ln -s '/galaxy/server/database/objects/b/4/c/dataset_b4cf287f-a4de-4f7c-a180-ab8ea165a6c5.dat' ./mate2.fastq  && ln -s '/galaxy/server/database/objects/b/4/a/dataset_b4a25add-3e11-4b93-ac15-c978cf9d5fec.dat' ./alevinmap.tsv && salmon alevin -l A -i ./index -1 ./mate1.fastq -2 ./mate2.fastq -o ./output -p "${GALAXY_SLOTS:-4}" --dropseq --tgMap ./alevinmap.tsv  --dumpFeatures --dumpMtx --maxNumBarcodes '100000' && gunzip output/alevin/quants_mat.mtx.gz
